title: Automate Instagram engagement & sentiment analysis with GPT-4 and Slack reports
description:
## üìä Description
Automatically analyze your Instagram posts‚Äô engagement and audience sentiment using GPT-4 to uncover top-performing content and improvement opportunities. üí¨üìà
 This workflow fetches your latest Instagram posts using the Facebook Graph API, evaluates likes, comments, and tone, then generates structured performance insights. The results are logged into Google Sheets, shared via Slack alerts, and emailed through Outlook ‚Äî empowering your social media team with daily, AI-powered engagement intelligence. üöÄ

## What This Template Does
1Ô∏è‚É£ Trigger ‚Äì Runs daily at 10 AM to fetch the latest Instagram posts. ‚è∞
 2Ô∏è‚É£ Data Fetching ‚Äì Uses the Facebook Graph API to extract post data, captions, likes, and comments. üì≤
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Formatting ‚Äì Cleans and structures post and comment data for analysis. üß©
 4Ô∏è‚É£ AI Evaluation ‚Äì GPT-4 analyzes engagement metrics and comment sentiment to score post performance. ü§ñ
 5Ô∏è‚É£ Decision Routing ‚Äì Flags high- and low-performing posts for separate processing. ‚öôÔ∏è
 6Ô∏è‚É£ Notifications ‚Äì Sends positive performance summaries or negative alerts to Slack. üí¨
 7Ô∏è‚É£ Logging ‚Äì Records engagement metrics, sentiment labels, and AI recommendations in Google Sheets. üìä
 8Ô∏è‚É£ Reporting ‚Äì Emails detailed performance summaries to the marketing team via Outlook. üíå

## Key Benefits
‚úÖ Automates social performance tracking across Instagram posts
 ‚úÖ Provides AI-driven sentiment and engagement insights
 ‚úÖ Flags top or underperforming content for immediate action
 ‚úÖ Delivers Slack and email reports for team visibility
 ‚úÖ Centralizes analytics in Google Sheets for trend tracking

## Features
- Facebook Graph API integration for Instagram post and comment retrieval
- GPT-4 sentiment and engagement evaluation
- Structured JSON insights and recommendations
- Slack alerts for both positive and negative performance
- Google Sheets data logging with trend metrics
- Outlook email reporting for management visibility
- Customizable scheduling and thresholds

## Requirements
- Facebook Graph API credentials connected to your Instagram Business account
- OpenAI API key for GPT-4 or GPT-4o-mini
- Slack Bot token with chat:write permissions
- Google Sheets OAuth2 credentials with edit rights
- Microsoft Outlook OAuth2 credentials for email delivery
- Optional environment variables for IDs:
- SHEET_ID, SLACK_CHANNEL_ID, OUTLOOK_EMAIL

## Target Audience
1. Marketing and social media teams optimizing engagement üì£
2. Agencies managing multiple Instagram accounts üßë‚Äçüíº
3. Analysts tracking performance metrics and audience tone üìä
4. Brands automating daily performance reports üìÖ

## Step-by-Step Setup Instructions
1Ô∏è‚É£ Connect your Facebook Graph API to your Instagram Business Account.
 2Ô∏è‚É£ Add OpenAI API credentials (use GPT-4 model for best results).
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Configure Slack for team notifications and specify the channel ID.
 4Ô∏è‚É£ Link Google Sheets and set your sheet ID for data logging.
 5Ô∏è‚É£ Connect Microsoft Outlook for daily performance email reports.
 6Ô∏è‚É£ Adjust the schedule (default: 10 AM daily) to suit your workflow.
 7Ô∏è‚É£ Run a test once, verify data mapping, and enable automation. ‚úÖ
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
